content:
On March 31, US Ambassador Bridget Brinka, together with President of Ukraine Vladimir Zelensky, honored the memory of Ukrainians killed by the invaders during the occupation of the Buchan community.

This is stated inmessageBridget Brink.

“Today I joined President of Ukraine Vladimir Zelenskyand other international partners to honor those who died from the Russian troops during the temporary occupation of Russia, Irpin and Borodyanka in the Kyiv region, as well as in the cities and villages of Sumy and Chernihiv regions, ”the US Ambassador said and assured our country. .

"We are with Ukraine," Bridget said.

Recall US Ambassador Bridget BrinkcommentedThree in a row, air alarm that was announced in Kiev on the night of March 30 to March 31, 2024.

As reportedАрміяInform, on the second anniversary of the liberation of the Kiev region from Russian invaders, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy honored the memory of Ukrainians killed by invaders during the occupation of the Buchan community.

Also Moldova President Maya Sandu on the second anniversary of Bucha's liberation from Russian invaderscalledDemocratic countries to continue Ukraine's support.

Recall422 bodies killed by civilians killed in Bucha after de -occupation.
title: I and I with Ukraine: US Ambassador to Bucha honored the memory of Russian -killed peaceful inhabitants
